title: Allergies
content:
# Allergies
### Key points about allergies
  * An allergy happens when your immune system overreacts to substances called allergens. 
  * Your body treats an allergen as an invader and begins to create antibodies against it in an effort to remove it.
  * Common allergens include house dust mites, grasses, pollen, pet dander, foods, some medicines, insect stings, latex and moulds. 
  * Symptoms range from mild
  * Children have more allergies than adults.
